data.name: The Great Ace Attorney 2: Resolve Grand Performance Recording
data.detailed_description:
TAKE THAT!

The soundtrack of The Great Ace Attorney 2: Resolve makes its grand debut in the West!

Immerse yourself in the rich, orchestral themes of 19th-century courtroom battles with this 49-track album composed by Yasumasa Kitagawa, Yoshiya Terayama, and Hiromitsu Maeba.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
